CustomField.description: This field is optional and is populated by the Section Builder tool. The field denotes whether a section configuration should return records in a specified sorted order. The value should use appropriate syntax for the ORDER BY clause of a SOQL query. The default value is empty and returns records in no specific order.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is optional and is populated by the Section Builder tool. The field denotes whether a tier should return records in a specified sorted order. The value should use appropriate syntax for the ORDER BY clause of a SOQL query.
CustomField.label: Sort Criteria
